sentences.sContent: Don’t suddenly take up violent exercise after years of inactivity.
sentences.sCn: 多年没锻炼不要突然进行剧烈运动。

sentences.sContent: The time spent between jobs should not be a period of inactivity.
sentences.sCn: 工作之余不应无所事事。

synos.tran: 静止；不活泼；休止状态；不放射性

words.tran: 不活跃的；不活动的；怠惰的；闲置的
[生物] 失活；[化学] 钝化（作用）
使不活动；使不活泼；阻止活动

trans.tranOther: the state of not doing anything, not moving, or not working
